ygData.subject: Re: New Thread Time
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) modifying socials --- go to the main interface screen and right click on a social button. It brings up a template that allows you to enter 4 or 5 /commands
ygData.messageBody:
1) modifying socials --- go to the main interface screen and right click on
a social button. It brings up a template that allows you to enter 4 or 5
/commands as well as rename it. You can then drag this to the button bar
just like any other button.

2) snake fang --- can't say. never used one.

3) map urls --- http://24.1.216.195/1/eq/index.html,
http://gameznet.com/eq/maps/, http://eq-online.com/maps/,
http://www.gamespot.com/features/everquest_gg/appa.html.

4) bellow --- level 12, don't know damage

5) prices --- charismatic carrilon is supposed to do this but the effect is
"VERY weak".

6) swallow --- african or european?

Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin








tucker_01@... on 04/29/99 02:48:47 PM

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com








To: eqbards@onelist.com

cc: (bcc: Terry Chlebek/DPT)



Subject: [eqbards] New Thread Time









From: "Matthew Tucker" <tucker_01@...>

I have a few questions regarding the game in general...as well as a
few bard related questions.

My first question is: How do I modify a social? (such as making a
hotkey to say 'Hail and well met friends I am such and such the
Bard', or a bow button...or a /loc...or a /who...etc...etc...)

Is the snake fang worth using? I have a very high skill in one
handed slashing and am getting tired of it, thinking of changing but
really dont know what skill to get. (im 10th level btw)

Does anyone have a URL for some EQ maps?...yes the vault and stratics
have a few...but im looking to put together a book of maps for a
buddy of mine, and need a few more maps (such as the troll newbie
area, etc...)

What level do you get Boistrous Bellow at? And exactally how much
damage does it to per 'tick'?

I have noticed if I go to any bard guild hall, they seem to sell me
items cheaper than any other shops...plus they buy for a few more
silver than the other places. Is there a spell out there which will
make the shopkeepers (regular ones) buy and sell cheaper? I assume
there is being we are the most charasmatic bunch on Norrath ;)

Ok one last question to all you fantasy loving freaks out there
(sorry couldnt think of another question at this time...)

scroll downnnn.....






























WHAT IS THE MEAN VELOCITY OF AN UNLADEN SPARROW? ;)

i couldnt resist :P
